name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Colin JOHNSON, Appellant
docket_number: Appeal No. 44 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1994

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Colin JOHNSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Prior Report: 432 Pa.Super. 686, 635 A.2d 203.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: ORDER PER CURIAM.

attorneys: William E. Ruane, for C. Johnson.
William H. Ryan, Jr., Dennis C. McAndrews, William R. Toal, for Com.
